SEARCH
Package interfaces

Interface MedicalRecInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
MedicalRecordUI
public interface MedicalRecInterface
This interface defines methods related to managing medical records for patients. It includes functionality for viewing patient medical records, selecting a patient for review, and updating medical records.

The methods in this interface are intended to be implemented by classes that provide functionality for handling patient medical records, including viewing, selecting, and updating records.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<MedicalRecord>
    choosePatient(Scanner sc, Doctor doctor)
    Allows the doctor to choose a patient for reviewing their medical records.
    void
    updatePatientRecords(Scanner sc, List<MedicalRecord> records)
    Updates the medical records of a specific patient.
    void
    viewPatientMedicalRecords(Patient patient)
    Displays the medical records of a specific patient.

  • Method Details

    • viewPatientMedicalRecords

      void viewPatientMedicalRecords(Patient patient)
      Displays the medical records of a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patient - The Patient whose medical records are to be viewed.

    • choosePatient

      List<MedicalRecord> choosePatient(Scanner sc, Doctor doctor)
      Allows the doctor to choose a patient for reviewing their medical records.
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for reading user input.
      doctor - The Doctor who is selecting the patient.
      Returns:
      A list of MedicalRecord objects for the selected patient.

    • updatePatientRecords

      void updatePatientRecords(Scanner sc, List<MedicalRecord> records)
      Updates the medical records of a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for reading user input.
      records - A list of MedicalRecord objects to be updated.
